name: Adobo
description: A flavorful Filipino dish made with meat marinated in soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, and spices.

name: Agua Fresca
description: A refreshing Mexican drink blending fruits, water, and sugar, often served over ice for a fruity and sweet flavor.

name: Apple Pie
description: A classic American dessert with a flaky pastry crust filled with sliced apples, sugar, and spices, often served warm.

name: Bacon
description: Savory meat product made from cured and smoked pork belly, known for its crispy texture and smoky, salty flavor.

name: Bagel
description: A ring-shaped bread roll often served with various toppings such as cream cheese, smoked salmon, or jam.

name: Baklava
description: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey or syrup.

name: Banana Bread
description: Moist and sweet bread made from ripe bananas and ingredients like sugar, flour, and eggs.

name: Banh Mi
description: A Vietnamese sandwich filled with grilled meats, pickled vegetables, and fresh herbs, served in a crispy baguette.

name: Barbecue
description: A cooking method where meat and vegetables are slow-cooked over an open flame or in a smoker, often basted with flavorful sauces.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A Russian dish with tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce, typically served with noodles or rice.

name: Biryani
description: A fragrant South Asian rice dish made with spiced rice and meat, often seasoned with aromatic spices.

name: Biscuit
description: A small, baked bread product that is fluffy on the inside, often served with butter, jam, or gravy.

name: Borscht
description: An Eastern European soup made with beets, often garnished with sour cream.

name: Bread Pudding
description: A dessert made by combining stale bread, milk, eggs, sugar, and spices, creating a custardy treat.

name: Brownie
description: A dense and chocolatey dessert square or bar, known for its fudgy texture and intense cocoa flavor.

name: Bubble Tea
description: A Taiwanese drink with tea, milk, or fruit flavors, often served with chewy tapioca pearls.

name: Bulgogi
description: A Korean dish with thinly sliced marinated beef, often grilled or stir-fried and served with rice.

name: Burrito
description: A Mexican dish with a flour tortilla filled with ingredients like beans, rice, meat, cheese, and salsa.

name: Butter Chicken
description: An Indian dish with tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato sauce, often accompanied by naan or rice.

name: Cannoli
description: An Italian pastry made of deep-fried dough tubes filled with a sweet and creamy ricotta cheese filling.

name: Cappuccino
description: An Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, known for its rich and frothy texture.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A moist and spiced cake made with grated carrots and often includes ingredients like nuts and cream cheese frosting.

name: Ceasar Salad
description: A classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Chai Latte
description: A spiced tea drink made with black tea, milk, and a blend of aromatic spices like cinnamon, cardamom, and ginger.

name: Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy dessert made with a sweetened cream cheese or ricotta filling on a graham cracker or pastry crust.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A pasta dish featuring fettuccine noodles, tender pieces of chicken, and a creamy Alfredo sauce.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: A comforting soup made with chicken, vegetables, and noodles, often seasoned with herbs and served hot.

name: Chimichanga
description: A deep-fried burrito typically filled with shredded meat, beans, cheese, and spices, often served with salsa and sour cream.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: A classic cookie made with chocolate chips and often featuring a soft and chewy texture.

name: Chow Mein
description: A Chinese stir-fried noodle dish with vegetables, meat or tofu, and a savory sauce.

name: Clam Chowder
description: A creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, and bacon, often served in a bread bowl.

name: Cobb Salad
description: A salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, chicken, and blue cheese, often served with vinaigrette dressing.

name: Coconut Curry
description: A curry dish made with coconut milk, vegetables, and a variety of spices, often served with rice or noodles.

name: Coffee
description: A popular beverage made from roasted coffee beans, known for its stimulating effects and various preparation methods.

name: Corn Dog
description: A deep-fried hot dog on a stick, coated in a thick layer of cornmeal batter, often served with ketchup or mustard.

name: Croissant
description: A buttery and flaky pastry often enjoyed as a breakfast item or as a base for sandwiches.

name: Cupcake
description: A small cake often topped with frosting, typically served as an individual dessert.

name: Dalgona Coffee
description: A South Korean coffee drink made with whipped instant coffee, sugar, and hot water, often served over milk.

name: Dim Sum
description: A Chinese meal of small, flavorful dishes, often served with tea, featuring items like dumplings, buns, and spring rolls.

name: Doughnut
description: A fried or baked pastry ring typically coated with glaze, icing, or sugar.

name: Dumplings
description: Small dough pockets filled with various ingredients like meat, vegetables, or sweets, often steamed or fried.

name: Eggnog
description: A creamy and spiced beverage made with milk, cream, sugar, and beaten eggs, often enjoyed during the holiday season.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Slices of eggplant coated in breadcrumbs, fried, and baked with tomato sauce and cheese until bubbly and golden.

name: Empanada
description: A pastry turnover filled with various ingredients like meat, cheese, or vegetables, often baked or fried.

name: Enchiladas
description: Tortillas rolled around a filling (typically meat or beans), covered with sauce and cheese, and baked until bubbly.

name: Espresso
description: A strong coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans, known for its concentrated flavor.

name: Falafel
description: Fried balls or patties made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, often served in pita bread with tahini sauce and vegetables.

name: Fish and Chips
description: A British dish featuring battered and fried white fish, typically served with thick-cut potato fries and tartar sauce.

name: Fried Chicken
description: Chicken pieces coated in a seasoned flour or batter mixture, deep-fried until crispy and golden.

name: Fried Rice
description: A dish made with cooked rice, vegetables, and often, meat or tofu, stir-fried together with soy sauce and spices.

name: Frittata
description: An Italian egg dish similar to an omelette, often featuring various ingredients like vegetables, cheese, and herbs.

name: Fruit Salad
description: A medley of fresh fruits, often served with a light dressing or garnished with mint leaves.

name: Gin and Tonic
description: A classic cocktail made with gin and tonic water, typically garnished with a slice of lime.

name: Gingerbread
description: A sweet and spiced bread or cookie often made in the shape of gingerbread people or houses.

name: Goulash
description: A stew made with meat (usually beef or pork), vegetables, and seasoned with paprika and other spices.

name: Gumbo
description: A flavorful Louisiana stew made with a variety of ingredients like meat, seafood, and vegetables, often served over rice.

name: Guacamole
description: A creamy dip made from mashed avocados, lime juice, and seasonings, often served with tortilla chips.

name: Gyros
description: A Greek dish with sliced, seasoned meat (often lamb or chicken), served in a pita with vegetables and yogurt-based sauce.

name: Hamburger
description: A sandwich made with a ground meat patty (usually beef) served in a bun with various toppings and condiments.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A warm beverage made with milk or water and cocoa powder or melted chocolate, often topped with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Hot Dog
description: A cooked sausage served in a sliced bun, typically garnished with mustard, ketchup, onions, and other toppings.

name: Ice Cream
description: A frozen dessert made from sweetened and churned cream or milk, available in a wide variety of flavors.

name: Iced Tea
description: A chilled tea drink, often sweetened and flavored, served with ice cubes and a lemon slice.

name: Jambalaya
description: A spicy Creole or Cajun rice dish made with a mix of meats, vegetables, and seasonings.

name: Kare-Kare
description: A Filipino oxtail stew with a rich peanut sauce, often served with vegetables and shrimp paste.

name: Key Lime Pie
description: A tangy and sweet pie made with Key lime juice and a graham cracker crust, often garnished with whipped cream.

name: Kimchi
description: A spicy and fermented Korean side dish made with Napa cabbage and a variety of seasonings.

name: Lasagna
description: A layered Italian pasta dish made with sheets of lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, meat sauce, and mozzarella.

name: Lemonade
description: A refreshing drink made with lemon juice, water, and sugar, often served cold and garnished with a lemon slice.

name: Lobster Bisque
description: A creamy soup made with lobster meat, often flavored with sherry and garnished with herbs.

name: Macaroni and Cheese
description: A comfort food dish made with cooked macaroni pasta and a cheesy sauce, often baked until golden and bubbly.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: A Thai dessert made with glutinous rice, ripe mango slices, and a sweet coconut milk sauce.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: A Sichuan dish featuring soft tofu and ground pork cooked in a spicy and savory sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A Japanese drink made with matcha green tea and steamed milk, known for its vibrant green color and earthy flavor.

name: Meatball Sub
description: A sandwich filled with meatballs, marinara sauce, and melted cheese, often served in a sub roll or baguette.

name: Miso Soup
description: A Japanese soup made with fermented soybean paste (miso), seaweed, tofu, and often, green onions.

name: Mojito
description: A Cuban cocktail made with white rum, lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water, known for its refreshing taste.

name: Nachos
description: A popular snack made with tortilla chips topped with melted cheese and a variety of toppings like jalapeños, salsa, and sour cream.

name: Nasi Goreng
description: Indonesian fried rice cooked with a blend of spices, often garnished with fried shallots, egg, and prawn crackers.

name: Noodle Soup
description: A soup dish featuring noodles and broth, often served with vegetables, meat, or seafood, and flavored with various seasonings.

name: Omelette
description: A dish made by whisking eggs and cooking them in a pan, often with fillings like cheese, vegetables, and meats.

name: Onion Rings
description: Slices of onions coated in batter and deep-fried until crispy, often served as a snack or side dish.

name: Pad Thai
description: A Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, eggs, tofu or shrimp, and a flavorful sauce.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy and round breakfast cakes made from batter and often served with syrup, butter, or fruit.

name: Panna Cotta
description: An Italian dessert made with sweetened cream or milk, often flavored with vanilla and set with gelatin.

name: Peking Duck
description: A Chinese dish featuring roasted duck with crispy skin, often served with pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced vegetables.

name: Pho
description: A Vietnamese soup made with broth, rice noodles, and thinly sliced beef or chicken, typically garnished with fresh herbs and lime.

name: Pina Colada
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream or coconut milk, and pineapple juice, often blended with ice.

name: Pineapple Fried Rice
description: A Thai dish featuring fried rice cooked with pineapple chunks, vegetables, and often, shrimp or chicken.

name: Pizza
description: A round, flatbread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and a variety of toppings, often baked in an oven.

name: Poutine
description: A Canadian dish featuring French fries topped with cheese curds and smothered in gravy.

name: Pozole
description: A Mexican soup or stew made with hominy (dried maize kernels) and meat, often garnished with radishes, cabbage, and lime.

name: Pretzel
description: A baked bread product often twisted into a knot shape and sprinkled with coarse salt.

name: Pulled Pork
description: Slow-cooked and tender shredded pork often served as a sandwich or with barbecue sauce.

name: Quesadilla
description: A Mexican dish made by filling a tortilla with cheese and various ingredients, then grilling or frying until the cheese melts.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup dish featuring Chinese-style wheat noodles, broth, and toppings like sliced pork, seaweed, and green onions.

name: Risotto
description: An Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice, broth, and ingredients like mushrooms, cheese, and wine.

name: Samosa
description: A fried or baked pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and often, meat or lentils, popular in South Asian cuisine.

name: Sashimi
description: A Japanese dish featuring thinly sliced raw fish or seafood, often served with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Scrambled Eggs
description: Eggs beaten and cooked until they form soft, curd-like pieces, often seasoned with salt and pepper.

name: Shawarma
description: A Middle Eastern street food made with thin slices of seasoned meat, typically served in a pita or flatbread with toppings and sauces.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A dish made with shrimp cooked in a garlic butter sauce, often served over pasta or with crusty bread for dipping.

name: Smoothie
description: A blended drink made with fruit, yogurt, milk, or juice, often served as a refreshing and nutritious beverage.

name: Sorbet
description: A frozen dessert made with fruit puree or juice, water, and sugar, known for its fruity and refreshing taste.

name: Spaghetti
description: A type of pasta served with a variety of sauces, including marinara, Alfredo, and pesto.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Asian appetizers made with rice paper wrappers filled with vegetables, shrimp, and other ingredients, often served with dipping sauce.

name: Steak
description: A slice of beef or other meat cooked to the desired level of doneness, often seasoned with spices and served with side dishes.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: A dessert made with layers of sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, raw fish or seafood, and other ingredients like vegetables and seaweed.

name: Taco
description: A Mexican dish made with a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients like meat, cheese, and salsa.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: A dish made by marinating chicken in yogurt and spices, then roasting it in a tandoor (clay oven), resulting in flavorful and tender meat.

name: Tiramisu
description: An Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, often dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: A spicy and sour Thai soup made with ingredients like shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and lime leaves.

name: Tonkatsu
description: A Japanese dish featuring breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet, often served with a tangy sauce and shredded cabbage.

name: Tortilla Soup
description: A Mexican soup made with tomatoes, chicken, tortilla strips, and a variety of seasonings, often topped with avocado and cheese.

name: Ube Halaya
description: A Filipino dessert made from purple yam (ube), coconut milk, and sugar, often used as a sweet spread or filling.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A burger patty made from plant-based ingredients like vegetables, grains, and legumes, often served in a bun with toppings.

name: Waffles
description: A breakfast dish made with batter cooked in a waffle iron, resulting in a grid-like pattern and crispy texture.

name: Yakitori
description: A Japanese skewered and grilled chicken dish, often seasoned with a savory sauce and served as a snack or appetizer.

name: Yakisoba
description: A Japanese stir-fried noodle dish made with wheat noodles, vegetables, and a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Zucchini Bread
description: A moist and spiced bread made with grated zucchini, often sweetened with sugar and flavored with cinnamon and nutmeg.
